text: Henock Trouillot (1923–1988) was a Haitian historian, playwright, and novelist. He wrote historical and sociological books, such as: * Historiographie d'Haïti (1954) * La Condition des Nègres Domestiques à Saint- Domingue (1955) * Economie et Finances de Saint-Domingue (1965) * La Vengeance du Mapou (1967) * Le Gouvernement du Roi Henri Christophe (1974) He was the uncle of Michel-Rolph Trouillot, the anthropologist and historical theorist. ==References== * Category:1923 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Haitian historians Category:Haitian male writers Category:20th-century historians Category:20th-century male writers Henock
